contextId.information: He is saying his affection and love now belong to her. AT: "have captured my love." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])
"My soul left, when he spoke." AT: "When he spoke, I felt like I had died." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])
contextId.quote: My heart sank; I became despondent

contextId.information: AT: "a man comes and wants to marry her." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: she will be promised in marriage
